Hey Jeff,

My HyperNEAT C++ implementation shuffles the population before t=
he start of each evaluation set, and then sorts the pop. by fitness at the =
end of speciation using a stable sort.  Ties are broken by the order of the=
 individuals in the population (first come, first serve), which is effectiv=
ely random if two individuals have the same fitness.
